TopicTitle: How to get into Aries 3A from groud?

Articles.Content:
I climbed to the top of the ladder then found unable to do things except letting go.

Edited July 28, 2013 by Cesrate

You have to climb up to where you're touching the canopy, then stop. Once you stop moving, the "Board [F]" thing will appear. Same with all such things. The "Grab" and "Board" options don't appear while you're inputting on keys (although if you're jumping or coasting in EVA, they do appear)

You have to climb up to where you're touching the canopy, then stop. Once you stop moving, the "Board [F]" thing will appear. Same with all such things. The "Grab" and "Board" options don't appear while you're inputting on keys (although if you're jumping or coasting in EVA, they do appear)

Could you give a picture?

Still can't board.

basically

i think you hv to alt+12 to go into debug and allow ur kerbal to walk on the tanks to get in

otherwise i never could get back in either
Hold down Shift and D, and then jump. You should land on the winglet. Then just enter the cockpit.

Hold down Shift and D, and then jump. You should land on the winglet. Then just enter the cockpit.
